com.ericbarnhill.jvcl

Class FDGPU

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ericbarnhill.jvcl.FDGPU

  • public class FDGPU
extends java.lang.Object
    This class performs Finite-Differences convolutions on the GPU. OpenCL is required. Because of the need to create GPU objects, the FDGPU methods are not static and must be instantiated.
    Since:
    0.1
    Author:
    ericbarnhill

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      FDGPU()
